meanings.definition: A resin obtained from certain tropical trees, used in varnishes and lacquers.
meanings.sent1: The artist applied a coat of damar to protect the painting.
meanings.sent2: The furniture maker used damar to give the wood a glossy finish.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook the damar for honey and got stuck.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the sweet scent of damar, filling the room.
meanings.sent5: The damar resin gleamed like liquid gold in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A type of varnish made from this resin.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter carefully brushed the damar varnish onto the table.
meanings.sent2: The old violin had a beautiful sheen from the damar varnish.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended the damar varnish was a magical potion.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as the freshly applied damar varnish.
meanings.sent5: The damar varnish brought out the rich colors of the painting.

meanings.definition: To repair or strengthen a structure with damar.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter decided to damar the cracks in the wooden floor.
meanings.sent2: She carefully damared the fragile antique vase to prevent it from breaking.
meanings.sent3: The superhero used his special powers to damar the collapsing building.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like a bond that could damar any challenge.
meanings.sent5: The damar work on the bridge made it sturdy and safe for crossing.
